definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: A country of southwest Asia at the southern tip of the Arabian peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 西南亞一國家，位於阿拉伯半島南端。

sentences.english: Awlaki was the leader of external operations for al Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 奧拉基負責阿拉伯半島“基地”組織的對外行動。

sentences.english: The Tropic of Cancer crosses which three countries on the Arabian Peninsula?
sentences.chinese: 北迴歸線穿過阿拉伯半島的哪三個國家？

sentences.english: The caliph of bagdad fly on his magic carpet to Arabia.
sentences.chinese: 巴格達的國王駕著魔毯飛到了阿拉伯半島。
